mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_inbounddetail (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, IBID, SKUID, PLANQUANTITY, QUANTITY, UNIT, STORAGEID, SKUNAME, NEWSKU) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ibid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsku,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_wms_inbounddetail set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IBID = #{ibid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANQUANTITY = #{planquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGEID = #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUNAME = #{skuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEWSKU = #{newsku,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, IBID, SKUID, PLANQUANTITY, QUANTITY, UNIT, STORAGEID, SKUNAME, NEWSKU from t_wms_inbounddetail where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, IBID, SKUID, PLANQUANTITY, QUANTITY, UNIT, STORAGEID, SKUNAME, NEWSKU from t_wms_inbounddetail
